name: Wormhole (Celeste Chan)
description:
This is week five's Game a Week prototype. The theme was: Weird Input.

Protect your wormhole from other aliens by sending out sound waves through your microphone. Scream and shout while looking ridiculous as you ward of them nasty foreigners.

This game is experimental and the mic may not work well depending on your equipment. There are keys which you can use that produce sound.
